Name: Bastard Little Zombie
About the game: I bet you don't have enough patience, enough strength, enough smartness to complete this journey... Bastard Little Zombie is an impossible Platformer/Puzzle/Trial-And-Error game, one of the hardest and most challenging indie platformer you'll play. It's going to be very tough to keep going and the road to take won't always be so obvious... Will you make it? •Explore and beat 3 nearly impossible levels. •Each level has its own handcrafted environment. •Figure out the next move to make in order to beat the level. •Find the right road to take to move forward. This game was created by a single developer and this is his first project.
